Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Other Finding/Diverticulosis/Colonic Diverticulosis
Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Intestinal Diseases/Colonic Diseases/Diverticulosis, Colonic
Record.Description: A pathological condition characterized by the presence of a number of COLONIC DIVERTICULA in the COLON. Its pathogenesis is multifactorial, including colon aging, motor dysfunction, increases in intraluminal pressure, and lack of dietary fibers.
